mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY FOOD_INDEX DESC) RNUM, FOOD_INDEX, FOOD_CONTENT, FOOD_THUMB, FOOD_IMG, FOOD_SIZE, FOOD_KATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY EVENT_INDEX DESC) RNUM, FOOD_INDEX, FOOD_CONTENT, FOOD_THUMB, FOOD_IMG, FOOD_SIZE, FOOD_KATE FROM TB_FOOD WHERE FOOD_KATE = 'F')

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY FOOD_INDEX DESC) RNUM, FOOD_INDEX, FOOD_CONTENT, FOOD_THUMB, FOOD_IMG, FOOD_SIZE, FOOD_KATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY EVENT_INDEX DESC) RNUM, FOOD_INDEX, FOOD_CONTENT, FOOD_THUMB, FOOD_IMG, FOOD_SIZE, FOOD_KATE FROM TB_FOOD WHERE FOOD_KATE = 'T')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_FOOD( FOOD_INDEX, FOOD_CONTENT, FOOD_THUMB, FOOD_IMG, FOOD_SIZE, FOOD_KATE ) VALUES( TB_FOOD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{FOOD_CONTENT}, #{FOOD_THUMB}, #{FOOD_IMG}, #{FOOD_SIZE}, #{FOOD_KATE} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_FOOD SET FOOD_CONTENT = #{FOOD_CONTENT}, FOOD_IMG = #{FOOD_IMG}, EVENT_THUMB = #{EVENT_THUMB}, FOOD_SIZE = #{FOOD_SIZE}, FOOD_KATE = #{FOOD_KATE} WHERE FOOD_INDEX = #{FOOD_INDEX}
